MCMC Line Painting Art Generation

mcmcPainter-package.Rd

Generate artistic line paintings using Reversible Jump MCMC algorithms with automatic image analysis and parameter optimization. Creates beautiful line-based artwork from target images through iterative optimization of line parameters.

Details

Package:mcmcPainter
Type:Package
Version:0.1.0
License:MIT + file LICENSE

The package provides functions to:

  • Load and analyze target images with automatic dimension detection

  • Verify PNG files and detect renamed image files

  • Auto-configure MCMC parameters for optimal performance

  • Run MCMC algorithms to generate line paintings

  • Create beautiful triptych visualizations

  • Save results in multiple formats

Key functions:

  • run_line_painter: Main function with auto-configuration

  • auto_configure_mcmc: Intelligent parameter optimization

  • get_image_info: Image analysis and PNG verification

  • create_triptych: Create triptych visualizations

  • save_triptych: Save triptychs to files

  • load_image_rgb: Load and resize images

  • save_png: Save images to PNG format

  • view_rgb: Display RGB arrays as images

Author

David Hodgson <david@example.com>

References

Reversible Jump MCMC algorithms for line-based artwork generation.
